fields.fieldValue: If you cancel {subscription.type.name}, you can still use it until {subscription.valid.date}.
Are you sure you want to cancel {subscription.type.name}?
You'll lose access to your {subscription.type.name} benefits such as ad-free music and offline listening.
You'll still be able to use {subscription.type.name} until {subscription.valid.date}.
{subscription.type.name} has been cancelled.
You can still use {subscription.type.name} until {subscription.valid.date}. If you change your mind, you can resume it in MySpark before this date.
You're currently paying with your {current.paymentmethod}. You can change it to another payment method.
Your payment method has changed.
Future payments for {offerName} will be made with your {paymentLabel}.
Change your {subscription.type.name} account details including password or communication preferences.
Email used for {subscription.type.name}: {user.emailId}
You'll be taken to the {subscription.type.name} website.
You can still use {subscription.type.name} until {subscription.valid.date}.
Your {subscription.type.name} ends on {subscription.valid.date}. If you change your mind, you can resume your {subscription.type.name} during this time.
Great! {subscription.type.name} has been resumed.
You'll restart your next payment of {subscription.type.amount} on {subscription.type.date}.
You're almost ready to start using {subscription.type.name}!
You'll be taken to the {subscription.type.name} website to sign in or create a new account
Go to {subscription.type.name}
It looks like you're activating your {subscription.type.name} subscription
You can use the {subscription.type.name} subscription as soon as it's activated. It may take up to {subscriptionActivation.lockTtl} to see it activated in MySpark.
OK
Great! You've changed to {subscription.type.name}
You'll be able to use it in 15 minutes. The payment will be added to your monthly bill.
